text: Balcanoona Airport (IATA:LCN, ICAO:YBLC) is a small, privately owned airport running out of Balcanoona, South Australia. == Facilities == There is one runway made of asphalt, with a heading of 05/23 and with a length of 4199 ft (1280 m). ==See also== *List of airports in South Australia == References == Category:Airports in South Australia Category:Far North (South Australia)
title: Balcanoona Airport
